# VST3 Plugin

# Installation

Downloadopen in new window the zip package. Unzip it, and move it to your VST3 folder ~/Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/VST3.

WARNING

NOTE: The plugin is in a pre-alpha state. It has only been tested on Ableton 11 on MAC M1.

# Usage
